mapper.sql: WtringsID, WritingsName, WritingsAbstract, WritingsType, WritingsTime, WritingsPeople, WritingsQuote, Remark
mapper.insert: insert into lab_writings (WtringsID, WritingsName, WritingsAbstract, WritingsType, WritingsTime, WritingsPeople, WritingsQuote, Remark) values (#{wtringsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{writingsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writingsabstract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writingstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writingstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writingspeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writingsquote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into lab_writings
WtringsID,
WritingsName,
WritingsAbstract,
WritingsType,
WritingsTime,
WritingsPeople,
WritingsQuote,
Remark,

mapper.update:
update lab_writings
WritingsName = #{writingsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WritingsAbstract = #{writingsabstract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WritingsType = #{writingstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WritingsTime = #{writingstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WritingsPeople = #{writingspeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WritingsQuote = #{writingsquote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where WtringsID = #{wtringsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
